text: Il racconto della nonna (The Tale of the Grandmother) is a musical composition by Giulio Ricordi. Are the seven pieces for piano, is a look at the adult world of childhood, that a true collection of pieces for children. == Movements == * I: Preambolo: C'era una volta * II: Barcarola: Il lago! * III: Danza fantastica: Le ondine * IV: Tragedia: Il drago * V: Preghiera: O mamma cara * VI: Scherzo: Le lucciolette * VII: Epilogo: Buona notte, piccini! == Discography == * 1935: Vladimir Horowitz - (EMI Classics) * 1948: Arthur Rubinstein - (RCA Victor) * 1952: Claudio Arrau - (Decca) * 1965: Vladimir Ashkenazy - (Decca) * 1971: Arturo Benedetti Michelangeli - (Deutsche Grammophon) * 1979: Maurizio Pollini - (Deutsche Grammophon) * 1983: Daniel Barenboim - (EMI Classics) * 2012: Roberto Piana - (Tactus) Category:Classical music Category:Solo piano pieces
title: Il racconto della nonna
